channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The White House took down the nation's top climate report. You can still find it here
item.description: The National Climate Assessment is the most influential source of information about climate change in the United States.

item.title: Televangelist Jimmy Swaggart dies at age 90
item.description: Jimmy Swaggart, one of the most well-known televangelists of the 1980s, has died, according to a social media post from his ministry.
